Toni Collette has adopted many an accent while playing characters on the big screen. 
But the Australian actress says that the one she found most challenging of all was Welsh - which she had to lear… [+3383 chars]

articles.author: Kristy Johnson
articles.title: Disney is reportedly already planning a sequel for Cruella just one week after its debut - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Hollywood Reporter claimed on Friday that the sequel is 'in early development' and will see director Craig Gillespie and screenwriter Tony McNamara return.
articles.content:
Disney is reportedly already planning a sequel to Cruella, after it earned a staggering $48.5 million at the global box office.
It's understood bossed are planning a follow-up to the 1970s crime cap… [+3605 chars]

articles.author: Sarah Hodgson
articles.title: Seaside village so stunning that hardly anyone actually lives there - Lancs Live
articles.description: Only a handful of the 50-odd homes in the cove have permanent residents who live there all year round, it is said. Two of those are a couple from Lancashire who moved in 1968.
articles.content:
Welcome to the seaside village so stunning nearly every house is a second home and locals have been priced out by millionaires - leaving just one left.
Cwm-yr-Eglwys in Pembrokeshire was a bustling … [+5196 chars]
